Do u know the project Mindcraft?

It seems you might be referring to **Minecraft**, one of the most popular video games ever created.

**Minecraft** is a 3D sandbox game developed by Mojang Studios (originally by Markus "Notch" Persson). It allows players to build constructions out of textured cubes in a 3D procedurally generated world. Key features include:

*   **Building and Crafting:** Players gather resources to craft tools, items, and build structures.
*   **Exploration:** Vast, infinite worlds with diverse biomes, caves, and structures to discover.
*   **Survival and Adventure:** Players can face hostile mobs, mine for rare resources, and even defeat a final boss.
*   **Creativity:** A highly open-ended experience that encourages player ingenuity.

Released in 2011, Minecraft is recognized as the best-selling video game of all time, with over 300 million copies sold across various platforms as of late 2023 [1].

***
[1] Microsoft. (2023, October 15). *Minecraft has sold over 300 million copies*. Xbox Wire. Retrieved from [https://news.xbox.com/en-us/2023/10/15/minecraft-300-million-sold/](https://news.xbox.com/en-us/2023/10/15/minecraft-300-million-sold/)

I know search GitHub
